Text: RE Federicos birthdayPST Is that Saturday th or th Original Message From Francesco Sedati mailto Sent Wednesday January AM To Marco S Mauro Paul Lisa Eltin Claudio ana PMMSXSEPCSHELLCOM Dave Subject Federicos birthday Hey guys we want to organize a dinner for Federicos birthday next saturday Massimos guest house would be ideal but we need to reach a quorum in order to reserve it Please let us know ASAP if youre coming and fill free to bring other people Food and drinks are very welcomed See you on saturday
